text: Edgar Babayan (; born 28 October 1995) is an Armenian professional footballer who plays as a winger for Danish Superliga side Hobro IK and the Armenia national team. ==Club career== ===Randers FC=== Babayan has played for Randers FC since he started playing football. On 11 November 2013, Babayan got his debut for Randers FC at the age of 18. Babayan started on the bench, but replaced Alexander Fischer in the 83nd minute in a 1–4 defeat against AaB. In February 2014, Babayan signed his first professional- and full-time contract ever, with Randers FC. Babayan scored his first goal for Randers on 9 July 2015, when he came on the pitch in the 59nd minute replacing Joel Allansson, against Andorran club Sant Julià in the Europa League qualifications. Babayan scored in the 73nd minute on a freekick. ====Loan to Hobro IK==== On 27 January 2017 it was confirmed, that Babayan would play the rest of the season on a loan at Hobro IK. Babayan got an injury against Skive IK on 27 February 2017 in a friendly match, before the league began again. The first rumors were, that he had suffered a ligament injury, but later announced, that it only was a bad hamstring in the knee, that would keep him out for about a month. Babayan went back from the injury in the start of April 2017. He got his debut for Hobro in a 0–0 draw against HB Køge when he in the 69th minute replaces Lucas Jensen. In the next match against Nykøbing FC, Babayan scored 2 goals in their 3–1 win. Babayan won the Danish 1st Division with Hobro, and the club was promoted to the Danish Superliga again. He was a very important profile in their hunt for promotion. ===Hobro IK=== After a successful 6-months loan stay, Babayan signed a permanent contract with the newly promoted Danish Superliga club. Babayan quickly became a key player for the team and made his breakthrough during the 2016–17 season. He was rewarded with a new contract in March 2018 until the summer 2021. ==International career== Babayan was born in Germany to Armenian parents who emigrated to Denmark when he was three. He received his Danish passport in 2016, and one month later got a callup and debut for the Denmark U20 squad in a 2–0 loss to the Italy U20s.(http://www.randersfc.dk/?side=10541Et 2–0 nederlag til Italien, men…‚ dbu.dk, 27 April 2016 Babayan made his debut in a friendly game against Malta on 30 May 2018, where he came in off the bench and played the last 30 minutes.Babayan fik en halv time for Armenien‚ bold.dk, 30 May 2018 He scored his first senior international goal on 18 November 2019, in a 9–1 away defeat to Italy, in Armenia's final Euro 2020 qualifier. ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Armenia's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" !
